column5: Deadline Reminder!  Don't forget tonight at the 10PM closing is the deadline for "WIN YOUR REGISTRATION BACK IN THE FORM OF A $120 BPS GIFT CARD!" draw! Drop your registration & payment off at the reel counter in BASS PRO SHOPS for your chance to win!  Also remember that everyone who attends this weekend's seminar sessions will receive a 15% discount coupon valid at BASS PRO SHOPS until Sun. Feb. 18, 2007! The way that some of you folks spend money there, you could pay off your seminar costs right there!  We'll look forward to seeing everyone on Saturday & Sunday!  Regards, Dave
